body:
This commit makes changes to UMPIRE and UMap packages. 
UMPIRE package changes:
1. Allows user to specify dependency on UMap. When +umap dependency is used, it builds a placeholder UMap branch, which will be merged into UMap's develop branch soon. 
2. Pulls UMPIRE feature branch (feature/integrate_umap) that builds with an installation of UMap. Ideally this will also get merged with UMPIRE's develop branch. 
Note: Since, UMap is an alternative to mmap, it is useful when file resources are used by UMPIRE. Hence, along with enabling UMPIRE_ENABLE_UMAP compilation flag, it also enables UMPIRE_ENABLE_FILE_RESOURCE flag.

Umap package change:
As stated above, once zero_map_file branch gets merged with the UMap's develop branch, this change won't be needed.
title: WIP: Spack package to build UMPIRE with UMap
